responsibility:
* Lead the development of cutting-edge web applications using React to improve user experiences.
* Collaborate closely with UI/UX designers to create accessible, intuitive, and visually appealing interfaces.
* Optimize performance using advanced React techniques (code-splitting, lazy loading, tree-shaking) to ensure fast load times and scalability.
* Integrate with RESTful, OData, and GraphQL APIs, ensuring seamless data flow and robust functionality.
* Mentor and guide junior developers, fostering a collaborative and innovative environment.
* Deploy React applications using Azure Static Web Apps, optimizing the deployment process via CI/CD pipelines in GitHub Actions.
* Continuously test and debug to ensure code quality and application stability.
requirement:
* 6+ years of front-end development experience with React
* Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3
* Experience with state management tools such as Redux or Context API
* Familiarity with tools like Git, Webpack, and component libraries (e.g., Material-UI, Tailwind CSS)
* Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Cypress)
* Experience building scalable, maintainable codebases
* Knowledge of TypeScript
* Server-side rendering (Next.js is a plus)
* Experience deploying web applications to Azure Static Web Apps
* Familiarity with OData services, RESTful APIs, and GraphQL
* Expertise in CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions) for automating testing, building, and deployment
* Experience with Progressive Web Applications (PWA) development
* Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes for development environments
* Familiarity with micro-frontends architecture

responsibility:
* Write clean, reusable, and maintainable code.
* Participate in code reviews to ensure high-quality standards.
* Develop scalable, modular web applications with a focus on security and stability.
* Collaborate with teams to build advanced AI-driven solutions.
* Deliver well-structured and documented code.
requirement:
*   Strong JavaScript or TypeScript skills
*   Open to applicants of all levels, from junior to industry experts
*   Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience
*   Strong understanding of ES6 and frameworks like Node.js or React
*   Knowledge of front-end, back-end, or full-stack development
*   Interest in building scalable, secure web applications with clean architecture
*   Good spoken and written communication skills in English

job-title: Senior Full Stack Engineer - (C#/.net & React JS) REMOTE
responsibility:
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable and performant applications using C# .NET WebApi for backend services.
* Migrate a legacy Ruby on Rails codebase to C# .NET WebApi while maintaining functionality and performance.
* Build dynamic, responsive front-end applications using Next.js or React.
* Engineer and optimize databases with PostgreSQL, ensuring data integrity and performance.
* Adhere to security best practices and address risks based on the OWASP Top 10 guidelines.
* Utilize DevOps principles such as Continuous Deployment, Feature Flagging, and Infrastructure as Code (IaC).
* Develop and maintain robust automated testing frameworks using tools like Selenium or Playwright to ensure high-quality releases.
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers to create innovative features and user experiences.
* Coordinate effectively with US-based employees to ensure alignment and seamless communication across time zones.
* Knowledge in AI-powered tools like Caliplot and Azure AI to streamline development workflows, enhance application functionality
* Write clear, concise documentation and communicate effectively in English through written and verbal mediums.
* Conduct peer code reviews to maintain high-quality standards and promote team growth.
* Mentor junior developers, fostering a culture of learning and collaboration.
requirement:
*   6+ years of overall experience.
*   At least 7 years of strong programming experience in C# .NET WebApi.
*   Advanced proficiency in Next.js or React for front-end development.
*   Expertise in PostgreSQL for database engineering and performance tuning.
*   Proven experience migrating legacy Ruby on Rails codebases to C# .NET WebApi.
*   Familiarity with OWASP Top 10 and security-focused development practices.
*   Experience with DevOps principles, including Continuous Deployment, Feature Flagging, and Infrastructure as Code (IaC).
*   Proficiency in automated testing frameworks (e.g., Selenium, Playwright).
*   Knowledge in Artificial Intelligence and AI-powered tools (e.g., Caliplot, Azure AI).
*   Working knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP).
*   Excellent written and verbal fluency in English.
*   Strong communication and collaboration skills, including availability to collaborate during US-based overlapping working hours.
*   Excellent debugging, problem-solving, and optimization skills.
*   Ability to conduct peer code reviews.
*   Ability to mentor junior developers.
*   **Preferred:** Working knowledge of Microsoft Azure.
*   **Preferred:** Experience with TypeScript.
*   **Preferred:** Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., GitHub Actions, Jenkins).
*   **Preferred:** Awareness of modern authentication methods (e.g., OAuth, JWT).

responsibility:
*   Strengthen and extend the existing prototype built with Next.js / React (TypeScript), backed by PostgreSQL / Supabase.
*   Refine onboarding, risk-scoring, case-management, and reporting workflows.
*   Add KYC/AML data sources, payment processing, advanced authentication (MFA, SSO), alert/notification channels, and domain association.
*   Drive end-to-end testing, security controls, and regulated-industry compliance.
*   Use Cursor, Claude, Copilot, etc. for code generation, test scaffolding, migration scripts, documentation, and quick architectural prototypes.
*   Prototype AI-powered product capabilities (e.g., suspicious-activity insights, natural-language rule builders).
*   Design, deploy, and operate scalable infrastructure on Vercel or Google Cloud Platform (GCP), with CI/CD, observability, performance tuning, and cost optimisation.
*   Partner with the Solution Architect / Product Manager on backlog grooming, workshops, and agile ceremonies.
*   Establish coding standards, lead code reviews, mentor teammates, and foster a product-engineering mindset.
requirement:
*   4+ years professional software development experience, including 2+ years in a senior or lead capacity.
*   Production expertise with Next.js & React, strict TypeScript, and modern state-management patterns.
*   Deep SQL & schema design on PostgreSQL, plus hands-on Supabase (RLS, Functions, Auth).
*   Node.js experience.
*   Experience deploying and operating workloads on Vercel or GCP.
*   Daily user of Cursor, Claude (Code), GitHub Copilot, or comparable AI coding assistants.
*   Track record of shipping in agile, product-led startup environments—balancing speed with maintainability.
*   Excellent written & spoken English for crisp specs, PRs, and stakeholder communication.
*   AML/KYC experience.
*   Sanctions-screening experience.
*   Experience implementing Stripe, Paddle, or similar payment flows.
*   Experience with Infrastructure-as-code (Terraform, Pulumi) and secure SDLC practices.
*   Ability to own the build—shipping features fast, integrating third-party services, hardening for security and compliance.
*   Comfortable utilizing AI tooling (Bolt, v0, Cursor, Claude Code, GitHub Copilot) into everyday development.
*   Experience strengthening and extending existing prototypes built with Next.js / React (TypeScript) and PostgreSQL / Supabase.
*   Ability to refine onboarding, risk-scoring, case-management, and reporting workflows.
*   Experience adding KYC/AML data sources, payment processing, advanced authentication (MFA, SSO), alert/notification channels, and domain association.
*   Ability to drive end-to-end testing, security controls, and regulated-industry compliance.
*   Capability to prototype AI-powered product capabilities (e.g., suspicious-activity insights, natural-language rule builders).
*   Experience designing, deploying, and operating scalable infrastructure with CI/CD, observability, performance tuning, and cost optimization.
*   Ability to partner with Solution Architect / Product Manager on backlog grooming, workshops, and agile ceremonies.
*   Experience establishing coding standards, leading code reviews, mentoring teammates, and fostering a product-engineering mindset.
*   **Nice-to-haves:**
    *   Experience with other compliance-driven systems.
    *   Built notification pipelines with Twilio, OneSignal, or equivalent.
    *   Familiarity with LLM fine-tuning / retrieval-augmented generation and vector databases.
